title: Clear history is not working
content:
Firefox is not deleting search history when using Clear Recent History. The URLs still appear in the Show All History.

In Settings under Privacy and Security, the box is ticked for Delete cookies and site data, and also for Clear history when Firefox closes. I have manually cleared cookies and site data and history within Settings, but the it still remains under History even when I've closed Firefox and restarted the PC.

Under Sync, the box for History is not ticked.

This has been happening for some time without me realising. I have now deleted pages.sqlite and this has cleared the history, but it still retains all new site data under History and will not clear it.

I have disabled then uninstalled anti-virus, I have removed CCleaner because this was also not deleting history.

And I've also reinstalled Firefox, but the problem persists.

What am I doing wrong please?

I am using Windows 11.
creator: lemm

title: CANNOT OPEN FIREFOX AT ALL
content:
I click on Firefox Icon, the icon explodes out then nothing happens. I have also tried clicking on it while pressing the option key so I can go into troubleshoot mode and get the same result. I have not found anything so far that addresses this particular situation.

I was already logged into my firefox account with my iPad. The bookmarks from my computer were synced to the cloud. I am pretty sure, however, that my last session was not synced, that is, I am pretty sure that all the windows I had open on my computer were not synced to the cloud.

What do you suggest to get Firefox going again? Ideally, I would like to bring back the sites I had open on the computer the last time I used Firefox on it. Possible?

thanks

Kevin
creator: kevinyc
